Font characteristics.durex: Curved sans-serif in white within a blue capsule shape (brand logo)

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail directly depicts a diverse group, echoing the messages in the title hashtags #ComeAsYouAre and #ComeTogether. The celebratory group pose, expressive fashion, rainbow gradient, and inclusive visual cues all reinforce the invitation to be oneself and unite, which aligns with the Durex campaign.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: No significant mismatch; thumbnail and title are well-aligned, both thematically and visually. The unity and inclusivity called for in the title are visually enacted in the thumbnail's vibrant, welcoming group composition.
